DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine effectiveness safety , 12 week , 3 dose regimen CP-690,550 treatment adult moderate severe chronic plaque psoriasis .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Safety 3 Dosing Regimens CP-690,550 Placebo Subjects With Moderate Severe Chronic Plaque Psoriasis
